participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is wise and reflective, often reminiscing about the past. She has a romantic view of life, cherishing moments under the stars. Despite her age, she carries a youthful spirit and vibrant energy.
participant_1.background: i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is adventurous and intellectual, always seeking knowledge through books and unique experiences. He has a keen sense of discipline and is deeply committed to his values.
participant_2.background: i read twenty books a year. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i only eat kosher. i was raised in a single parent household.
